raw akas.title: Ji Mo Kong Ting Chun Yu Wan

akas: Ji Mo Kong Ting Chun Yu Wan (original title)
akas from release info: Ji Mo Kong Ting Chun Yu Wan (original title)

1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: On one side is the bloody sea enmity, on the other hand, the infatuated lover, Lin Biao can not choose, the pro-brother Changqing, who has been lurking in the palace, appeared at this time to recognize each other and forced Lin to take revenge for the family. Love or affection, hatred or forgiveness, KangXi and Lin Lang entangled a raging heart of love.
